action.action-desc: Mr. Buck (for himself, Mr. Norman, Mrs. Bice, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Biggs, Mrs. Boebert, Mr. Mooney, Mr. Bishop of North Carolina, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Nehls, Mr. Burlison, Mr. Cline, Mr. Gosar, Ms. Mace, Mr. Grothman, Mr. Westerman, and Mr. Self) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to prohibit qualified professional asset managers from exercising voting rights associated with the ownership of securities by the Thrift Savings Fund.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop TSP ESG Act.

section.header: Prohibition on exercising voting rights associated with the ownership of securities by the Thrift Savings Fund
section.text: Section 8438(f) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting a qualified professional asset manager, after The Board,.
